title: Wide Sans Serif
content:
Sorry for the tiny image, hope it's possible to make some of it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828235836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/limited_5686.png)
author: P_P

comments.content:
First thought: [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828235836/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/engravers+gothic/)/ [Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828235836/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/blair/)/ [Sackers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828235836/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/sackers+gothic/)  
If you still need an exact match, it would probably be easier with more letters and, why not, the origin website.
Thanks Ryuk, Engravers was the one I was searching for.
